BadgeDetail.Name: Creative Commons
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has contributed to the commons. They understand the main creative commons license types and have published work using one of these licenses.

Task.Title: Contribute to the Commons
Task.Body: Publish a piece of work online using a creative commons license. This could be a piece of art or music you have created or some research you have written. Upload a link to the piece of work.
Task.HtmlBody: Publish a piece of work online using a creative commons license. This could be a piece of art or music you have created or some research you have written. Upload a link to the piece of work.
Task.TextileBody: Publish a piece of work online using a creative commons license. This could be a piece of art or music you have created or some research you have written. Upload a link to the piece of work.
